column4: what is the command to display all the channels in freenode ?
will unix commands work on ubuntu terminal ?? my frnd is going to learn unix.... i thiink linux is made from unix.... so will unix commands work on ubuntu terminal ?????
most will as most are the same
so my frnd can do unix cmnds in terminal of ubu itself ?
otherwise your friend could install freeBSD
there are no install addons option vbox OSE
if you install the addons there will be a shared folder
where are the addons ?? any download link ?
on the Vm go to the install addons , it will mount an iso where you can install the addons withing the client
start the client, then devices > install guest addons
ok .. but it says connection timed out error :'(
you should install the addons regardless, it makes the vm a lot better experiance, and a lot more seemless\
